SEARCH

Class SpriteManager

java.lang.Object
SpriteManager
public class SpriteManager extends Object
Represents the class that builds sprites from spritesheet paths.

Also responsible for handling animations, and changing sprites when appropriate.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpriteManager

      public SpriteManager(String spriteSheetPath, double spriteSheetWidth, double spriteSheetHeight, int columns, int rows, Pet pet)
      Constructs a new sprite manager.

      Responsible for building sprites and their animations. There should be one of these per stat bar and pet.

      Parameters:
      spriteSheetPath - the sprite sheet path
      spriteSheetWidth - the sprite sheet width
      spriteSheetHeight - the sprite sheet height
      columns - the number of columns in the sprite sheet
      rows - the number of rows in the sprite sheet
      pet - the pet object

  • Method Details

    • extractFrames

      public void extractFrames(String spriteSheetPath)
      Extracts frames from a given sprite sheet and places them into the frames list.
      Parameters:
      spriteSheetPath - the sprite sheet path

    • extractFrame

      public static javafx.scene.image.Image extractFrame(javafx.scene.image.Image spriteSheet, int row, int column, int totalColumns, int totalRows)
      Extracts a single frame image and returns it.
      Parameters:
      spriteSheet - the sprite sheet containing the image
      row - the row of the frame
      column - the column of the fram
      totalColumns - the total number of columns in the sprite sheet
      totalRows - the total number of rows in the sprite sheet
      Returns:
      the image containing the sprite

    • setCurrentFrame

      public void setCurrentFrame(int frameIndex)
      Manually sets the current frame if necessary.

      Start the animation of the sprites.

      Stopos the animation of the sprites.

    • translateSprite

      public void translateSprite(double xPercent, double yPercent, double screenWidth, double screenHeight)
      Dynamically translates sprite based on screen size
      Parameters:
      xPercent - the x percent to translate the sprite
      yPercent - the y percent to translate the sprite
      screenWidth - the screen width
      screenHeight - the screen height

    • scaleSprite

      public void scaleSprite(double targetWidth, double targetHeight)
      Scales sprite based on passed width and height, preserving aspect ratio
      Parameters:
      targetWidth - the intended width of the sprite
      targetHeight - the intended height of the sprite

    • getSpriteView

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView getSpriteView()
      Returns the current sprite image
      Returns:
      the current sprite image.

    • setEmotion

      public void setEmotion(int emotion)
      Sets the pet's current emotion. Used to change the sprite of the pet.
      Parameters:
      emotion - the current emotion of the pet, represented as a final int from this class.

    • setStats

      public void setStats(double stat, double maxStat)
      Sets the stat for stat bars. Used to update the current stat bars.
      Parameters:
      stat - the new stat
      maxStat - the pet's max stat
